page.title: 12MELSONBY-Village Churches
page.content: In the village there are {two {churches,}an{Anglican}(just outside the area of this survey) and a {Methodist.} The {Methodist Minister }lives in {Darlington}and has the oversight of one large town church and the village chapel. Each Sunday,{Sunday School } meets in the morning in the village school and in the afternoon there is a service in the chapel. There is a {Ladies Fellowship} and a { House {Fellowship. } There are plans to renovate the village chapel. The {Vicar} has oversight of four village churches plus the private chapel at{Aske Hall}and he lives in {Gilling.} The{Anglican Church Hall}is used for many village activities.
